abstract: Nasdaq OMX and IntercontinentalExchange said they would take their $11 billion offer for NYSE Euronext directly to shareholders after twice being rebuffed.
snippet: Nasdaq OMX and IntercontinentalExchange said they would take their $11 billion offer for NYSE Euronext directly to shareholders after twice being rebuffed.
lead_paragraph: 7:24 p.m. | Updated The Nasdaq OMX Group and the IntercontinentalExchange announced on Monday that they would take their $11 billion takeover offer for NYSE Euronext directly to the company’s shareholders.

headline.main: Nasdaq OMX and ICE Go Hostile in NYSE Bid

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
